WRITING.TEXT: Mind linking the post?, i actually searched through posts before i made this to make sure i wasn't copying anyone...
show me the post? This is OC mate

Not sure a pin would matter at that point if they've gotten that far into your account. Pretty sure they know it, or have means to get around it. Or they wouldn't have gone through the trouble of going through emails, passwords etc.

WRITING.TITLE: Rename twisted bow to seercull
WRITING.TEXT:
Seercull name stands for mage killer The name can be attributed to the combination of the word seer (another word for "mage or wizard") and the word cull (another word for "kill"). In other words, the mage-killer
Twisted bows function is Actually a mage killer, where as seercull only lowers mage levels.
Examine on seercull: An ancient Fremennik bow that was once used to battle the Moon Clan.
Rename it to Lunar bow.
- Fifth age bow - Ancient bow - Fremennik bow
Any one of those that actually fits the fremmenik lore.
